name: Bubble Go - POP Bubble Shooter
description:
Bubble Go! - A brand new exciting spinning bubble shooting puzzle game!!
Start your engines and be ready to be entertain by Bubble Go! You just need to pop the bubbles and make sure that you clear all the bubbles and beat the challenges!!

Bubble Go has an incredibly cool design level and very addictive gameplay because It’s not just about "point and shoot the bubbles" you need to make a combination of 3 or more bubbles with same color to make them explode and what makes this game more exciting is you need to pay attention to how the bubble will spin!! Your goal is to break the glass in the middle of the bubbles to collect the stars. The more bubble you pop the more stars and score you will get.

【FEATURES】
- Match 3 or more same bubbles, Aim, Shoot, and pop all the bubbles
-Bubbles are spinning: predict the movement and shoot the balls
-Booster like laser and super rotation are ready to help you
-Spin the lucky wheel to get FREE BOOSTER
-Over 150+ levels with full of fun waiting for you
-Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.

Contact us: cs.bubblego@gmail.com
Follow us: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialBubbleGo/
